title: Do Not Disturb rule not enabling?
content:
I'm having problems with time-based Do Not Disturb rules not activating.

The rule is:

Days: Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri
Start Time: 10:59PM
End Time: 8:30AM next day
Alarm can override end time: Enabled

During initial creation at night, the rule works but then it doesn't automatically enable the next day. Even if I toggle the rule from on to off and then back to on, it doesn't enable. I have to delete and create a new rule to make it work.

Device is a Pixel 3XL running stock Android with latest patches.

Any ideas? Thanks!
